KUWALLA TEEPr: [QUA-LI–TY] Kuwalla|Tee was inspired by our frustration of cheap 3 packs and our love for basics. In May of 2012 we launched our first premium 3-pack cotton tees and have since grown into a ready-to-wear clothing label, focused on delivering the best quality basics on the market.

Kuwalla Tee, pronounced as ‘quality’, is a Canadian streetwear brand founded in 2012.

Most brands try to sell a big idea. Ours is simple. Kuwalla Tee stands for quality. We want our products to always live up to our name. We strive to design and create the most comfortable clothes at the best possible price points with the best fit.
